channel.title: Waiting method?!?
channel.description:
How would I go about making a waiting period before the next object is placed..
i,e: c.getPA().object(objectId, 5, 5, 1, 10); [b]WAIT TIME HERE[/b] (90000) //90 seconds c.getPA().object(object2Id, 5, 5, 1, 10);
thread.wait, and thread.sleep are [i]NOT[/i] options, those blocks will do two things: oversee the Animation in the script, and bog down the server.
PLEASE, help me.
Maybe using this?? [code]System.currentTimeMillis();[/code]

item.title: Waiting method?!?

@Clawz_fury wrote:

Its really not man trust me. If you need any help message me.

item.title: Waiting method?!?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Whoever told you to use ‘Thread.sleep()’ needs mental help.

Solution: use a task! Google search grahams task scheduler and utilize that in this situation.

Read full topic

c.getPA().object(objectId, 5, 5, 1, 10);
WAIT TIME HERE (90000) //90 seconds
c.getPA().object(object2Id, 5, 5, 1, 10);

thread.wait, and thread.sleep are NOT options, those blocks will do two things: oversee the Animation in the script, and bog down the server.

PLEASE, help me.
